original_title: Trapianto, consunzione e morte di Franco Brocani
overview: Trapianto heralds the end of utopia, the death of that underground, but is also the best prologue in Necropolis, which is not by chance found alive. It 's a film that establishes the passage of rolling between two friends, and Brocani Schifano, shared the same passions, and from living the cinema as a challenge urgent and vital, suspended between dream and action.
title: Transplantation, Consumption and Death of Franco Brocani
